title: Somehow one of my contacts is set to call automatically when I click on it. How can I remove that?
content: I can see in my Favorite contacts this one contact has a phone next to the picture.  When I click that contact, it automatically calls the number.  I want to reset it so it just opens the contact info like all my other contacts.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
